Articles.Content:
I always wanted to make in-flight refuel. I got the machines but i cant do it by myself. So I need a pilot for refuelled aircraft.

Basicly the refuelling is about to dock 2 flying vessels and then crossfeed the fuel. If you want to become test pilot post below!

You will need Kerbal Multi Player Mod which is avaiable to download here

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kmp-client/

I tried this once, it's incredibly hard...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63762-Mid-Air-Refueling-Challange?highlight=refueling+challenge

Flying in formation is hard enough, now you want us to dock in flight?! I might be of some use to you though I am not the best "formation" flyer and I might not be able to run the mod. But I do have a huge expanse of jets somewhere if you need a new one. Nice job though, the thing should hold up.

I'm in, but it's gonna depend on what time you want to do it

here's my steam, if that's what you have the game on.

http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198024190513/
